subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] How to start
author: Carol B.
full_text:
OK,
I've read that there are technicians assigned to us...I asked if I had
been assigned one as of yet, and got a very clear "Yes"...I asked the name
of my technician, and got a very clear, "Ben".  I have not started to
record these yet, but my question to the group is this...Does anyone else
have a Ben as a tech?

Carol B.
